results.title: The Day Before I Went Away
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Guo Jian
results.brief_description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.
results.description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.

results.title: A 30 second portrait, starring Phil Lombardo
results.creator_credit: SBS Independent, ACMI and Cherine Fahd
results.material_description: Single channel moving image, colour and audio
results.brief_description: Cherine Fahd’s loving and gently funny video portrait of Phil Lombardo, a young man obsessed with Michael Jackson, continues her visual investigation into the politics of personal identity.
results.description: Cherine Fahd’s loving and gently funny video portrait of Phil Lombardo, a young man obsessed with Michael Jackson, continues her visual investigation into the politics of personal identity.

results.title: 50 years of cardiology
results.brief_description: Working in cardiology for many years, Graeme Sloman explains the many achievements he and his fellow colleagues have made in preventing heart disease-related fatalities and building a greater public awareness of heart disease. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with the National Heart Foundation of Australia (Victorian Division) and in partnership with VicHealth.
results.description: Working in cardiology for many years, Graeme Sloman explains the many achievements he and his fellow colleagues have made in preventing heart disease-related fatalities and building a greater public awareness of heart disease. results.title: The Boy from Taurianova
results.brief_description: Rocco arrived from Calabria in 1962 at the age of 19 and immediately started his working life on a potato farm in Ballarat. He lovingly dedicates this story of his life to his daughter Connie. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).

results.title: Australia: per forza e per amore
results.brief_description: Giovanni was working on an olive farm as a teenager when he was suddenly called home - he was leaving for Australia in 2 hours! In this story he tells of his life since that day and how he became a political figure in his new homeland. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).

results.title: Carmel: storyteller
results.brief_description: Carmel is a retired school teacher, wife, mother and grandmother. Her family’ s life dramatically changed when she was diagnosed with early onset memory loss. With her husband, she tells their story and looks positively in the face of an unknown future. Created as part of the ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer’s Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.
results.description: Carmel is a retired school teacher, wife, mother and grandmother. Her family’ s life dramatically changed when she was diagnosed with early onset memory loss. results.title: Hotline Bling

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.
description_for_label: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.

results.title: Inside Kendall Jenner’s Cozy L.A. Hideaway

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.
description_for_label: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.

results.title: Crash Zone: No News is Good News
results.creator_credit: Pino Amenta, Kevin Nemeth, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description:
The kids are alone at Catalyst and having a great time when Kimberley arrives. She’s a news reporter, there to do a story on the testers. Mike is flattered but the other kids begin to suspect she’s a spy. Pi finally succeeds in getting rid of Kimberley only to find her own mother has tracked her to Catalyst. Pi’s unmasked. Now everybody knows she’s a rich kid.
Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Pino Amenta, Kevin Nemeth, Patricia Edgar, Buena Vista International, Disney Channel and Australian Children’s Television Foundation
